long_description: The Scott Scale 960 29er hardtail mountain bike combines fast-rolling 29 in. wheels with a realiable Shimano component set for high-speed, high-stoke singletrack performance. Lightweight, butted aluminum frame is tuned to optimize efficiency in the climbs and remain responsive when descending. Rock Shox XC 30 TK Solo Air suspension fork has 100mm of travel to smooth out trails; bar-top remote lockout lets you control suspension on the fly. Shimano XT Shadow rear derailleur, Deore shifters and Deore front derailleur offer consistent shifting across the 30 gears. Shimano hydraulic disc brakes provide easy, progressive braking with a 180mm rotor up front and a 160mm rotor in the back. Sturdy wheels are wrapped with the excellent all-arounder Schwalbe Rocket Ron tires to ensure great traction and fast-rolling performance on the trail. Full-length cable housing deters gunky buildup that saps shifting performance; replaceable rear derailleur hanger helps extend the frame's usable lifespan. Specs on the Scott Scale 960 29er hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
